AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: master glass smith
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Working glass was exceptionally hard work, and even with the secrets passed down to [PAWN_nameDef], it still took [PAWN_objective] considerable time until [PAWN_pronoun] produced anything to be proud of. But when that time came, it was clear that [PAWN_nameDef] had mastered working glass.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: master moonstone smith
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: One of [PAWN_nameDef]'s ancestors was a rather skilled moonstone smith, back when the Altmer were still Aldmer. Carefully passed down through generations, [PAWN_nameDef] had to endure endless nights of hard work before [PAWN_pronoun] was permitted to learn the secrets.
